data.lyric:
[ti:Righteous (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Righteous (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Righteous (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:01.21]Lyrics by：Nick Mira/Jarad Higgins/Ryan Vojtesak
[00:02.43]Composed by：Nick Mira/Jarad Higgins/Ryan Vojtesak
[00:03.65]I will
[00:07.03]I will
[00:10.47]I will
[00:24.80]Oh-ooh
[00:27.42]Uh
[00:28.71]All white Gucci suit I'm feeling righteous yeah
[00:32.11]I know that the truth is hard to digest yeah
[00:35.40]Five or six pills in my right hand yeah
[00:38.78]Codeine runneth over on my nightstand
[00:41.76]Takin' medicine to fix all of the damage
[00:45.08]My anxiety the size of a planet
[00:48.35]Yeah ooh
[00:48.86]Holes in my skull over time
[00:51.78]My heart's over ice
[00:53.58]Whoa
[00:54.05]Over ice I'm freezing
[00:57.28]Beautiful eyes deceiving
[01:00.67]We may die this evening
[01:04.02]Coughing wheezing bleeding
[01:07.24]High I'm an anxious soul
[01:10.31]Blood moons are my eyes stay low
[01:14.01]Red and black they glow
[01:17.33]Under attack in my soul
[01:20.85]When it's my time I'll know
[01:24.06]Never seen a hell so cold
[01:27.46]Yeah we'll make it out I'll know
[01:30.64]We'll run right through the flames let's go
[01:34.58]Go
[01:35.84]All white Gucci suit I'm feeling righteous yeah
[01:39.17]I know that the truth is hard to digest yeah
[01:42.43]Five or six pills in my right hand yeah
[01:45.89]Codeine runneth over on my nightstand
[01:48.91]Taking medicine to fix all of the damage
[01:52.18]My anxiety the size of a planet
[01:55.42]Yeah ooh
[01:55.98]Holes in my skull over time
[01:58.78]My heart's over ice
[02:00.50]Whoa uh
[02:02.22]I'm in too deep
[02:05.77]Can't swim like me
[02:09.01]We're drowning so I will see
[02:15.73]My demons ten feet under me
[02:21.40]Inhale exhale but I can't breathe
[02:24.79]Too busy drinking codeine doin' high speeds
[02:27.83]Crash pour a four sip it slow make the time pass
[02:32.13]Take a pill for the thrill have a relapse
[02:35.66]Devil in my head tryna run gym laps
[02:38.75]I ain't tryna race he don't even know me like that
[02:43.02]All white Gucci suit I'm feeling righteous yeah
[02:46.44]I know that the truth is hard to digest yeah
[02:49.67]Five or six pills in my right hand yeah
[02:53.06]Codeine runneth over on my nightstand
[02:56.07]Taking medicine to fix all of the damage
[02:59.38]My anxiety the size of a planet
[03:02.58]Yeah ooh
[03:03.06]Holes in my skull over time
[03:05.93]My heart's over ice
[03:07.76]Whoa
[03:19.92]I will see
data.trans:
[ti:Righteous (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Righteous (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.21]//
[00:02.43]//
[00:03.65]我愿意
[00:07.03]我愿意
[00:10.47]我愿意
[00:24.80]//
[00:27.42]//
[00:28.71]身穿白色古驰套装 我感觉自己气宇轩昂
[00:32.11]我知道真相让人难以接受
[00:35.40]手里攥着五六颗药
[00:38.78]床头柜上全是***
[00:41.76]吃点药来抚慰心伤
[00:45.08]我的焦虑就像一颗星球一样巨大
[00:48.35]//
[00:48.86]随着时间的流逝 我的脑袋上伤痕累累
[00:51.78]我的心早已麻木
[00:53.58]//
[00:54.05]冷冰冰的 我快冻僵了
[00:57.28]美丽的双眸 蒙蔽了我
[01:00.67]我们也许今晚难逃一死
[01:04.02]咳个不停 气喘吁吁 鲜血淋漓
[01:07.24]嗨翻天 我倍感焦虑
[01:10.31]双眼通红 像血月一样
[01:14.01]它们发出了红色和黑色的光芒
[01:17.33]我的灵魂 备受打击
[01:20.85]我时间到了的时候 我会知道
[01:24.06]从未见过冰冷刺骨犹如地狱的地方
[01:27.46]我们会成功的 我知道的
[01:30.64]我们会穿越熊熊烈焰 我们走吧
[01:34.58]出发
[01:35.84]身穿白色古驰套装 我感觉自己气宇轩昂
[01:39.17]我知道真相让人难以接受
[01:42.43]手里攥着五六颗药
[01:45.89]床头柜上全是***
[01:48.91]吃点药来抚慰心伤
[01:52.18]我的焦虑就像一颗星球一样巨大
[01:55.42]//
[01:55.98]随着时间的流逝 我的脑袋上伤痕累累
[01:58.78]我的心早已麻木
[02:00.50]//
[02:02.22]我陷得太深
[02:05.77]无法自拔
[02:09.01]我们奄奄一息 因此我会看见
[02:15.73]我的心魔就在我身下
[02:21.40]吸气 呼气 可我无法呼吸
[02:24.79]我尽情啜饮*** 纵享欢乐
[02:27.83]倒满一杯特调饮料 慢慢享用 消磨时光
[02:32.13]追求刺激 我吞下一片药 我重蹈覆辙
[02:35.66]我脑袋里的恶魔与我竞相角逐
[02:38.75]可我不想和他较量 他根本不了解我
[02:43.02]身穿白色古驰套装 我感觉自己气宇轩昂
[02:46.44]我知道真相让人难以接受
[02:49.67]手里攥着五六颗药
[02:53.06]床头柜上全是***
[02:56.07]吃点药来抚慰心伤
[02:59.38]我的焦虑就像一颗星球一样巨大
[03:02.58]//
[03:03.06]随着时间的流逝 我的脑袋上伤痕累累
[03:05.93]我的心早已麻木
[03:07.76]//
[03:19.92]我会明白
